title: Why some UK health workers are wearing bin bags
description: One intensive care doctor describes the reality faced by some UK health workers on the front line.
content: As the death toll from coronavirus continues to climb, hospitals across the UK are working flat out to create more intensive care beds for those who are critically ill. Speaking to the BBC, one intensive care doctor describes the crippling reality of a lack o… [+7687 chars]
